description: So far I have run into 6 variants of the magichome strip controllers and lightbulbs: Red Green Blue, Red Green Blue White, Red Green Blue Warm White Cold White, and the Green Red Blue version of each. All light bulbs that I have come across are RGBW. If a light bulb or strip controller has a dedicated white LED be sure to set 'purewhite' to true. If your red and green seem switched, be sure to use the green red blue variant.

accessories.name: 4-pin Red Green Blue Controller NO DEDICATED WHITE LEDS
4-pin Green Red Blue Controller NO DEDICATED WHITE LEDS Choose this if your green and red are inverted
5-pin Red Green Blue White Controller DEDICTATED WHITE LEDS
5-pin Green Red Blue White Controller DEDICTATED WHITE LEDS Choose this if your green and red are inverted
6-pin Red Green Blue Warm White && Cold White Controller DEDICTATED WHITE LEDS
6-pin Green Red Blue Warm White && Cold White Controller DEDICTATED WHITE LEDS Choose this if your green and red are inverted
